alert.note: Alert for Western Crook; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 7:36PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Crook County through 800 PM MDT... At 736 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Upton, or 18 miles southwest of Sundance, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Haven. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 163 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for northeastern Wyoming.
